@robert1122 wrote:

Hey,

Ok, so basically the database has a row called donator, when donator = 1 in the database and the user logs into the game, it’s supposed to change isDonator to 1, it doesn’t seem to be working. Does anyone see any flaws in the code?

	public static boolean isDonator(Client clientToSave) {
		try {
		if (clientToSave.playerName != null) {
			query("SELECT FROM `users` WHERE donator = '0'");
			clientToSave.isDonator = 0;
		}
		else if (clientToSave.playerName != null) {
			query("SELECT FROM `users` WHERE donator = '1'");
			clientToSave.isDonator = 1;
		}

		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			return false;
		}
		return true;
	}

Thanks
